title: Harris County Public Health to Provide COVID-19 Testing at Challenger Columbia Stadium on Mondays
author: Department; Www Utmb Edu; Pedi; Home
cleaned_text: Starting Monday, September 27, 2021, [Harris County Public Health (HCPH) ](https://nam11.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftrack.spe.schoolmessenger.com%2Ff%2Fa%2FCvVYQfpZybsSq1AW3Y04ew~~%2FAAAAAQA~%2FRgRjL07cP0QoaHR0cHM6Ly9wdWJsaWNoZWFsdGguaGFycmlzY291bnR5dHguZ292L1cHc2Nob29sbUIKYUtcG05hN_N7TFIQTGNwZXJlekB1dG1iLmVkdVgEAAAAAQ~~&data=04%7C01%7CLcperez%40utmb.edu%7C032cd7414d2e4bf7ead008d97f8aa22d%7C7bef256d85db4526a72d31aea2546852%7C0%7C0%7C637681055674435790%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=NItubxMjnH9DoimZ0M8XDq%2FpkrlDs7KJfgePVjUzq%2FU%3D&reserved=0)will provide COVID-19 PCR tests, at no cost to the general public. Location: CCISD Challenger Columbia Stadium* [1955 77598 *North Parking Lot Date: Every Monday, starting September 27 for the next 4-6 weeks Hours of Operation: 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Cost: There is NO cost and NO insurance required Questions? For any questions, including information on test results, contact HCPH at 832.927.7575 Walk-ups are welcome
